sourcesContent: import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SharedService } from 'src/app/shared.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-login', templateUrl: './login.component.html', styleUrls: ['./login.component.css'], }) export class LoginComponent { Username = ''; Pass = ''; constructor(private sharedService: SharedService) {} async login(): Promise { this.sharedService.login(this.Username, this.Pass).subscribe(); } }
